channel.title: Good base? [done]
channel.description:
[b]What Is a Good Base?[/b] What is a good 317 server + client that is good for a base? I want a somewhat good source but not with a lot of problems.
any ideas? please only be a 317 server because thats the only one i know how to use XD
thanks

item.title: Good base? [done]
item.dc:creator: @05bgoodson 05bgoodson
item.description:
@05bgoodson wrote:

i’m making my first server and i’m learning quite alot about java, i admit there has been some up’s and probably alot more downs because of errors in code that i haven’t changed now decide that they wanna errors etc but i used rune-warfare as my base and its a server with only a few errors (that i’ve found so far) probably the biggest error is the models have plant pots for sara gs and bgs

Read full topic

item.title: Good base? [done]
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

hellwsfull:

delta is good for starting coders so i would pick delta to start with when u learned more about java make ur own or use shards or any other:)

No if you used delta, you wouldn’t go into Shard. You wouldn’t because you were into the easiness of delta coding, so you wouldn’t look into anything knew. Delta coded ‘Deltascape’ as if he were teaching someone to program a server.

Read full topic

I would suggest homeiscape but ye it is what you like not really what we like but if your asking our appinions i would say homiescape thats pretty good

item.title: Good base? [done]
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“i pk girls, post:5, topic:312663”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=409097.msg3019419#msg3019419 date=1257482456]
It’s what you like, not what we like. Find your own.
[/quote]You are answering people with stupid comment wtfs ur problem?
you are just trying to get posts right? i hate you ihope you die irl.

anyways use delta.[/quote]

NO, DELTA IS PATHETIC.

I suggest using something that fits you best. Don’t learn delta, because then that’s all you are going to do and use. Use:

Server: Shard
Client: 317 Deob
